title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015
heading: 1. This Order may be cited as the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015
text_raw:
1. This Order may be cited as the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 

(Commencement of Certain Provisions) Order 2020.
text_norm: 1 order may cited legal service regulation act 2015 (commencement certain provisions) order 2020

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015
heading: 2. The 18th day of December 2020 is fixed as the day on which the
text_raw:
2. The 18th day of December 2020 is fixed as the day on which the 
following provisions of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 (No. 65 of 
2015) shall come into operation: 

(a) 

section 5 and Schedule 2 (insofar as they are not already in 
operation); 

(b) 

section 183; 

(c) 

section 207. 

GIVEN under my Official Seal, 

16 December, 2020. 

HELEN MCENTEE, 
Minister for Justice. 

Notice of the making of this Statutory Instrument was published in 
“Iris Oifigiúil” of 29th December, 2020. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 
 [645] 3
text_norm: 2 18th day december 2020 fixed day following provision legal service regulation act 2015 (no 65 2015) shall come operation (a) section 5 schedule 2 (insofar already operation) (b) section 183 (c) section 207 given official seal 16 december 2020 helen mcentee minister justice notice making statutory instrument published iris oifigiuil 29th december 2020 645 3

title: conferred on me by section 1(2) of the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015
heading: (This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal
text_raw:
EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

This Order fixes 18 December 2020 as the day on which certain provisions of 
the Legal Services Regulation Act 2015 (No. 65 of 2015) come into operation. 

 
 
 
 
 
 
 4 [645]
